dare: Talk in a funny accent for the next three rounds.
Show the last photo you took on your phone.
Call someone and sing them a song.
Do your best impression of someone in the room.
Take a silly selfie and let someone else post it on your story.
Eat a spoonful of something spicy or sour.
Walk across the room like a penguin.
Wear your socks on your hands for the next two rounds.
Do five jumping jacks while keeping a straight face.
Spin around 10 times and then try to walk in a straight line.
Tell the group a jokeâ€”no laughing allowed!
Try to balance a spoon on your nose for 10 seconds.
Let someone draw something on your arm with a pen.
Pretend you're in a commercial and sell an item nearby.
Give your best superhero pose for 30 seconds.
Dance to the next song that plays (no matter what).
Say the alphabet backward as fast as you can.
Make up a funny story on the spot.
Try to whistle a full song (or hum if you can't).
Hold a weird face for 15 seconds.
Find three random objects and make up a story about them.
Let the group rearrange your hair however they want.
Act like a robot for one minute.
Talk using only movie quotes for the next round.
Let someone write a random word on your forehead in marker.
Do your best impression of a chicken for 10 seconds.
Try to lick your elbow (and let everyone watch).
Pretend you're in slow motion for the next two minutes.
